articles.title: Kim Jong Un Meets CPC Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Meets CPC Delegation
						
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, Friday met the visiting delegation of the Communist Party of China led by Li Jianguo, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Communist Party of China and vice-chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China. 
					Present there were Li Jianguo, Wang Jiarui, head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., the CPC, Wang Xiaohui, deputy head of the Publicity Department of the C.C., the CPC, Liu Jieyi, deputy head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., the CPC, Yao Zengke, vice-minister of Supervision, and Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK. 
					
					Also present there were Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Yang Gon, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, and Kim Song Nam, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK.
					
					Li Jianguo conveyed a personal letter of Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee and chairman of the Central Military Commission of the CPC, to Kim Jong Un. 
					
					He expressed thanks to Kim Jong Un for receiving the delegation by sparing precious time despite his tight schedule and informed him of the proceeding of the 18th National Congress of the CPC upon the authorization of the CPC Central Committee.
					
					He said the CPC Central Committee headed by General Secretary Xi Jinping is pleased that the Korean people have achieved great successes in the effort for building a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, true to the behests of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					China and the DPRK are friendly neighbors linked by the same mountain and rivers, he said, adding that it is the steadfast policy of the party and government of China to steadily boost the traditional Sino-DPRK relations of friendship and cooperation. 
					
					He renewed the will to make efforts together with the Korean comrades to successfully consolidate, build and develop the Sino-DPRK relations forged by the leaders of the elder generations of the two parties and two countries. 
					
					He sincerely hoped that Kim Jong Un and the WPK would register steady, fresh and bigger successes in building a thriving nation by leading the Korean people. 
					
					Kim Jong Un thanked for this, warmly welcomed the delegation's visit to the DPRK and congratulated the CPC on its successful 18th National Congress. 
					
					Kim Jong Un said the 18th National Congress of the CPC marked a historic event which reviewed theoretical and practical experience and achievements gained by the Chinese party and people in socialist construction and provided a new landmark for hastening the building of socialism with Chinese characteristics. 
					
					He expressed expectation and belief that the fraternal Chinese people would keep the stability of society and sustainable economic development and improve the people's living standard and thus attain the strategic goal for building a comprehensively well-off society of socialism under the leadership of the CPC with Xi Jinping as general secretary. 
					
					The CPC delegation presented a gift to Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Kim Jong Un expressed thanks for this.

articles.title: Vice-President of SPA Presidium Meets Russian Delegation
articles.content:
Vice-President of SPA Presidium Meets Russian Delegation
						
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, met the delegation of various political parties of the Amur Region Legislative Assembly of Russia led by Olga Lysenko, chief of the United Russia faction who is vice-chairwoman of the assembly. She paid a courtesy call on Yang and had a talk with him in a friendly atmosphere at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets Burkina Faso Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets Burkina Faso Ambassador
						
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun met and had a talk with new Burkina Faso Ambassador to the DPRK Idriss Raoua Ouedraogo who paid a courtesy call on him Friday.

articles.title: Malaysian Political Party Leader Supports Korean People's Cause
articles.content:
Malaysian Political Party Leader Supports Korean People's Cause
						
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Datuk Seri Tengku Adnan Tengku Mansor, secretary general of the United Malays National Organization of Malaysia, met the delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by its Vice Department Director Pak Kun Gwang and had a talk in a friendly atmosphere on Friday.
					The secretary general referred to the WPK's great efforts for developing the country's economy and improving the standard of people's living.
					
					He said the United Malays National Organization of Malaysia has always rendered support to the just cause of the WPK and the Korean people, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties would grow stronger.
					
					He hoped the Korean people would register greater success in building an economic power under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Prime Minister of Ivory Coast
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Prime Minister of Ivory Coast
						
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Choe Yong Rim, premier of the Cabinet of the DPRK, Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Daniel Kablan Duncan upon his appointment as prime minister and minister of Economy and Finance of Republic of Ivory Coast.
					Choe in the message wished the prime minister success in his work for the stability of the country and socio-economic development.
					
					And Foreign Minister of the DPRK Pak Ui Chun sent a greeting of message to Charles Koffi Diby upon his appointment as minister of State and foreign minister of Republic of Ivory Coast on the same day.

articles.title: CPC Delegation Lays Wreath before Friendship Tower
articles.content:
CPC Delegation Lays Wreath before Friendship Tower
						
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The visiting delegation of the Communist Party of China headed by Li Jianguo, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Communist Party of China and vice-chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China, laid a wreath before the Friendship Tower here on Friday.
					Present there were officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea including Kim Song Nam, vice department director of its Central Committee, Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					Laid before the tower was a wreath in the name of the delegation.
					
					The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the fallen fighters of the Chinese People's Volunteers who courageously fought against the armed invasion by the imperialists after their entry into the Korean front. Then they went round the tower.
					
					Li Jianguo wrote in the visitor's book that the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship would grow stronger.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
						
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Yanbian University of China paid tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Friday. The delegation is headed by Secretary of Party Committee Jin Xiong, It came here on the same day to take part in the commemorative event to mark the 60th anniversary of the Academy of Social Sciences.
					Members of the delegation laid a bouquet and bowed to the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Chinese Party Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Chinese Party Delegation Leaves
						
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Communist Party of China flew back home on Friday. It was led by Li Jianguo, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the CPC and vice-chairman of the Standing Committee of the Chinese National People's Congress.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Goes Back
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Goes Back
						
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The delegation of various political parties of the Amur Region Legislative Assembly of Russia led by Olga Lysenko, chief of the United Russia faction who is vice-chairwoman of the assembly, flew back home on Friday.

articles.title: Opera "The Flower Girl" Staged 1,500 Times
articles.content:
Opera "The Flower Girl" Staged 1,500 Times
						
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- 40 years have passed since the revolutionary opera "The Flower Girl" gave its premiere before the great men of Mt. Paektu. 
					The famous art piece was created by President Kim Il Sung during the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle. Through the destiny of a distress-torn family in exploitation society, it shows the truth that the revolutionary struggle is the only way out for the oppressed people. 
					
					Leader Kim Jong Il proposed to make the famous work "The Flower Girl" an exemplary "Sea of Blood"-style opera. He made sure that a powerful creative group was formed and gave detailed orientation and ways. 
					
					During the days of the creation of the opera Kim Jong Il gave full answers to the theoretical and practical problems including music, direction, stage arts, songs and acting on the stage. 
					
					The revolutionary opera completed under his energetic leadership gave its premiere on November 30, 1972 before President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					The Phibada Opera Troupe's 40-year long performing activities have made contributions to arousing the service personnel, working people of all social standings and school youth and children to the drive for building a thriving nation. 
					
					It gave hundreds of performances in foreign countries including China, Japan, France, Italy and Algeria, making the hot wind of the Korean opera rage across the world. 
					
					This year alone, the troupe gave at least 30 performances in Beijing, Shanghai and other parts of China, arousing great sensation among the audiences. 
					
					A meeting took place at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Friday. It was to mark the 40th anniversary of the premiere of the revolutionary opera "The Flower Girl" before Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					After the meeting the 1,500th performance of the opera was staged before full houses.

articles.title: Banquet Given on Day of Airmen in DPRK
articles.content:
Banquet Given on Day of Airmen in DPRK
						
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of the People's Armed Forces hosted a banquet on Thursday, the Day of Airmen.
					Present there were senior party and army officials and service personnel of the Air and Anti-air Forces of the Korean People's Army.
					
					Vice Marshal of the KPA Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, made a speech at the banquet.
					
					He said Generalissimo Kim Il Sung made sure that the first flying corps was established in new Korea shortly after its liberation, opened up a new history of building air forces and thus performed eternal exploits in the history of founding Juche-oriented army. 
					
					Generalissimo Kim Jong Il worked heart and soul to develop the Air and Anti-air Forces of the KPA into the elite air forces as required by the developing situation, upholding the idea of Kim Il Sung on founding the army, he noted, adding:
					
					The Air and Anti-air Forces of the KPA Generalissimos developed by devoting their whole life have greeted their heyday as they hold high the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un in high esteem as Supreme Commander of the KPA.
					
					The speaker stressed the need for all the service personnel of the Air and Anti-air Forces to cherish the love and trust shown by the dear respected Supreme Commander and prepare themselves to be powerful death-defying corps in the sky defending the party and leader.
					
					A art performance was given at the banquet.

articles.title: State Academy of Sciences Greets 60th Anniversary
articles.content:
State Academy of Sciences Greets 60th Anniversary
						
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The State Academy of Sciences of the DPRK is greeting the 60th anniversary of its founding. 
					President Kim Il Sung founded the State Academy of Sciences on December 1, 1952. He indicated orientation and ways in each period of revolution and construction and laid a strong foundation for scientific researches.
					
					Leader Kim Jong Il laid down the line of attaching importance to science and technology and indicated most scientific and revolutionary ways for innovation in the development of the country's science and technology. 
					
					Over the past six decades since its foundation the academy has developed into the leading scientific research institution and faithfully served the revolutionary cause of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) with sciences and technology. 
					
					Scientists and technicians of the DPRK recently established the production system for Juche-iron, Juche-fertilizer and Juche-fiber and solved scientific and technological issues in putting the industry of magnesia clinker on the Juche-basis and establishing a combined automation system at main factories and enterprises. 
					
					They have developed the technology of breeding new seeds, advanced cultivation methods, different organic combined fertilizers and biological agrochemicals. They, at the same time, made valuable research achievements by improving quality of consumer goods and solving the problems of drinking water and fuel. 
					
					Rapid progress has been made by them in developing the latest technologies including software, microelectronics, production of physiology active materials, nano technology and space technology. 
					
					A meeting took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Friday to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the State Academy of Sciences. 
					
					A congratulatory message to the scientists, technicians and employees of the State Academy of Sciences from the WPK Central Committee was conveyed. 
					
					The message highly praised the scientists, technicians and employees of the academy for having registered great successes in developing the nation's science and technology.

articles.title: National Exhibition of Liquor, Condiments Held in Pyongyang
articles.content:
National Exhibition of Liquor, Condiments Held in Pyongyang
						
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A national exhibition of liquor and condiments took place at the Pyongyang Yokjon Department Store on Nov. 27-30.
					The exhibition brought together hundreds of liquor and condiment makers.
					
					Kim Kyong Ho, an official of the Ministry of Foodstuff and Daily Necessities Industry, told KCNA:
					
					"The exhibition aims to generalize the successes and experience gained in making liquor and condiments. It was held in a way that examiners evaluate the exhibits' quality, packaging and trademarks.
					
					Conspicuous were pavilions of the Samilpho Specialties Factory, Taedonggang Foodstuff Factory, Sinuiju Condiment Factory and the Sakju Foodstuff Factory. The pavilions exhibited competitive goods which won appreciation of leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un." 
					
					Pang Un Ae, an official of the Samilpho Specialties Factory, said:
					
					"Varieties of liquor, produced by the factory, are popular among local people.
					
					Especially, Hana-trademarked liquor, which took the top prize at the 6th National Liquor Fair, is well received by overseas compatriots as well as foreigners."
					
					Meanwhile, the exhibition included lectures themed "Traditional Features of Korea's Liquor" and "Soy-making in Korea and Other Countries".

articles.title: 3rd Symposium on Cyclic Production System Held
articles.content:
3rd Symposium on Cyclic Production System Held
						
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The 3rd scientific symposium in the field of agriculture on cyclic production system was held at the Grand People's Study House under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea between Nov. 27 and 30.
					Present there were officials, scientists, technicians, teachers and researchers in scientific and educational units including Kim Il Sung University, the Pomological Institute of the Academy of Agricultural Science and in the field of agriculture including agronomy, stockbreeding, fruit farming and silk raising.
					
					There took place panel presentation of scientific and technological papers in the fields of agricultural production, stockbreeding, fruit farming and silk raising. Published there were 280 papers of practical significance.
					
					The participants exchanged achievements and experiences gained in increasing the agricultural production and settling the fodder issue for domestic animals with the use of the rotation production system and in introducing organic farming method including the production and use of organic fertilizer and organic agricultural chemicals.
					
					What drew the attention of the participants were technological lecture on scientific and technological issues arising in the work of establishing the cyclic production system and experience gained by those units which took lead in it.
					
					Speakers introduced the successes made by their units ensuring big profitability in the production of grain and meat thanks to the organic combination between farming and stockbreeding.
					
					During the symposium there was an exhibition of scientific and technological successes.

articles.title: Acupuncture Therapy Put on Scientific Basis in DPRK
articles.content:
Acupuncture Therapy Put on Scientific Basis in DPRK
						
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The Academy of Koryo Medicine of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has succeeded in applying the chart of meridian nerve points to treatment of facial nerve paralysis, slipped intervertebral disk, cerebral thrombosis and other intractable diseases.
					The chart refers to acupuncture points with Kyongrak (channels and collaterals) drawn on a model of human body. The theory on Kyongrak, found some 2 000 years ago, deals with anatomical and physiological features.
					
					After scores of years of research into Kyongrak, the academy made a metal model chart of meridian nerve points for the first time in the early 1990s, which was developed into the chart of national value later.
					
					The chart put acupuncture therapy on a more scientific basis.
					
					The chart's specification was introduced in books of the International Society of Acupuncture and has been applied to medical treatment in other countries.

articles.title: Railroading of Budget for Naval Base on Jeju Island Protested
articles.content:
Railroading of Budget for Naval Base on Jeju Island Protested
						
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The "Saenuri Party" of south Korea railroaded the 2013 budget for construction of naval base on Jeju Island through a meeting of the Defence Committee of the "National Assembly" despite strong protest of the opposition parties and people of different social standings on Wednesday, according to south Korean KBS.
					The naval base construction which has been persistently pushed forward by the puppet regime is a very dangerous action against the nation to turn Jeju Island into an advanced base for a nuclear war and realize the U.S. ambition for world domination and increase the military tension and war danger on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia. 
					
					The "Saenuri Party" unilaterally muscled the budget through the meeting in the absence of the lawmakers from the opposition parties who have called for full slice of the 2013 budget for the construction. 
					
					This goes to prove that the group is the despicable clan of traitors. 
					
					That day the lawmakers of the Defence Committee of the "National Assembly" from the Democratic United Party protested against the "Saenuri Party's" railroading of the budget and declared it totally invalid.

articles.title: Speedy Construction of Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum under Way
articles.content:
Speedy Construction of Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum under Way
						
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The construction project of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum is progressing apace. Soldier-builders finished the construction of structure of the main building in 70 days. 
					The main building of the museum will cover tens of thousands of square meters. Open-air exhibition sites will be newly built to suit to the group sculptures of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower, and there will appear a bridge and access corridor. The museum is a huge edifice of monumental value. 
					
					The dear respected Kim Jong Un opened up a grand blueprint to build the museum as required by the Songun era and gave detailed instructions to solve the problems in setting its location, construction, supply of materials, etc. 
					
					From the very beginning the soldier-builders have fully displayed the work-style and spirit of the Korean People's Army. 
					
					They introduced reasonable methods of construction to remove the earth of more than 50 000 cubic meters, finished the digging for foundation in a few days and completed ground concrete tamping in at least 20 days. 
					
					Construction processes were organized well and the builders gave precedence to embedding reinforcing bars and shuttering and proceeded to continuous concrete tamping with the help of pressure pipeline of mixture. The increased proportion of mechanization helped hasten the construction. 
					
					They have over-fulfilled daily tasks with devoted efforts. 
					
					After finishing the project of structure construction, the solder-builders moved to the next stage project for open-air exhibition sites, bridge, access corridor and others.

articles.title: New Korean Film Produced
articles.content:
New Korean Film Produced
						
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A Korean Feature film "Kim Ok Song, War Composer" (Parts 1 and 2) was produced.
					The film tells the story about composer Kim Ok Song who produced many famous songs powerfully encouraging the soldiers of the Korean People's Army and people.
					
					The song "Song of Women" composed by him right after the liberation of Korea contributed to arousing the women across the country to the building of a new country.
					
					During the days of the hard-fought war he fought alongside soldiers on heights in flames to wipe out enemies. Those days he created such militant and revolutionary songs as "To a Decisive Battle" and "My Song in the Trench," encouraging the army and the people to win a victory in the war.
					
					In the period of postwar rehabilitation and construction and the period of socialist construction, he kept abreast of the stirring situation and produced many works including "We Have Planted Apple Trees on Mountains" and "Rich Harvest Comes to the Chongsan Plain" loved by the people.
					
					President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk highly appreciated songs composed by Kim Ok Song and showed such warm love and trust as putting him forward as a war composer who faithfully followed the party.
					
					The film makes a truthful artistic representation of the fact that he is always remembered by the country and its people thanks to the profound care of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: New Kinds of Saunas Appear in Pyongyang
articles.content:
New Kinds of Saunas Appear in Pyongyang
						
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The Ryugyong Health Complex here which opened some time ago, boasts of new kinds of saunas.
					They include pine tree, salt and stalactite saunas. Their temperatures are lower than others, standing at around 50 degrees Celsius.
					
					The sauna room, with its floor and walls decorated with pine trees, helps enhance lung functioning and is highly effective for treatment of bronchial asthma and rheumatic arthritis. 
					
					The salt sauna makes salt emanate far infrared rays. Good for recovery from fatigue, it promotes curing circulatory and nervous diseases.
					
					The stalactite sauna helps better kidney and liver functioning.
					
					A Pyongyang citizen, Ho In Nam, told KCNA that he felt quite refreshed after taking a bath at the Ryugyong Health Complex.
					
					Newly reconstructed Bath House No. 1, too, is furnished with similar saunas.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's True Colors as War Maniac Exposed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's True Colors as War Maniac Exposed
						
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The crimes committed by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea this year have brought into bolder relief their despicable true colors as war maniacs.
					The group is hell-bent on the war racket against the DPRK.
					
					The bandit of the puppet army in Inchon City hung portraits of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu on walls and gates of internal units during the period when the DPRK was mourning over the passing of the great leader of the nation and pasted papers containing unspeakable letters above and below them. 
					
					The joint aerial live-fire exercise with the U.S. imperialist aggression forces, the largest one since the June 25 war, was committed targeting the DPRK flag, the first of its kind in history of joint military maneuvers.
					
					The Lee group prodded human scum to spread leaflets slandering the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, getting on the nerves of the DPRK and driving the situation to the brink of a war.
					
					It has resorted to the war maneuvers in the waters off the five islands in the West Sea of Korea, the biggest hotspots.
					
					While staging naval bombardments and aerial strike exercise almost every day in September, it did not hesitate to commit such provocative acts as firing bullets and shells at peaceable fishing boats in the territorial waters of the DPRK side.
					
					In October traitor Lee Myung Bak went to Yonphyong Island and openly agitated a war fever against the DPRK, urging the puppet warmongers to defend the "northern limit line".
					
					The warmongers staged the madcap war maneuvers with the involvement of the Marine Corps, warships and fighter planes on November 23. They held a "ceremony for victorious battle" on Yonphyong Island on the second anniversary of the Yonphyong Island shelling incident, making the tensions run high on the Korean Peninsula once again.
					
					The Lee group resorted to tightening military tie-ups with foreign forces, while raising a hue and cry over someone's "threat" and "provocation."
					
					From the outset of the year, the military warmongers including Jong Sung Jo, chairman of the puppet joint chiefs of staff, went to the U.S., their master, and signed the "guidelines for strategic plan" for the "plan for jointly coping with local provocation" the content of which is the involvement of not only the U.S. forces in south Korea but those in Japan and the Pacific in any local armed conflict on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					Afterwards, the master and his stooge had a confab in Seoul and concluded a contract on standard enforcement of the "agreement on mutual military support" which drastically simplified the procedures of wartime military support.
					
					Reaffirming the guidelines which were specified in "2015 strategic alliance" at the recent U.S.-south Korea military committee, the Lee group said that it would not pardon someone's provocation.
					
					At the annual security consultative council meeting, they had a confab over the issues of promoting mutual operation of the command control system of the allies and intensifying joint military exercises on islands in the West Sea of Korea, staging joint military exercises in south Korea for demonstrating improved alliance, reviving the now defunct "UN Forces Command", hurling the U.S. forces from around the world in case of contingency on the Korean Peninsula and beefing up the extended deterrent.
					
					The Lee group initially signed the military agreement with Japan in secrecy early in May under the backstage manipulation of the U.S. It brought this issue up for discussion at the "State Council meeting" under the general command of Chongwadae in late June and actively dealt with it at the "governmental" level.
					
					It introduced into the waters off south Korea the Japan "Self-Defense Forces" under the pretext of the exercise for "proliferation security initiatives of weapons of mass destruction" aimed at blocking maritime blockade on the DPRK.
					
					In October the group of traitors made public a "missile guidance agreement" in which it declared that it would extend the missile range to 800 km from the previous 300 km so as to strike the entire areas of the northern half of Korea, increase the weight of warhead for the higher striking efficiency and develop and possess new unmanned attack plane. This was an open provocation little different from its declaration to preempt an attack on the DPRK. 
					
					Scenarios for the invasion of the DPRK have been rounded off down to the details and the arms buildup has been stepped up. At the same time, joint military exercises have been staged with the U.S. imperialist aggression troops one after another the year round. 
					
					Peace and stability have not settled on the Korean Peninsula and the worst crisis persisted in which a war may break out any time this year due to the confrontation and war moves of the Lee group which put the successive puppet rulers into the shade.

articles.title: Elimination of Old Forces Is Basic Requirement for Realizing New Politics in S. Korea
articles.content:
Elimination of Old Forces Is Basic Requirement for Realizing New Politics in S. Korea
						
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The upcoming "presidential election" in south Korea puts the south Korean people at the crossroads of whether they allow the present conservative regime to stay in power or realize their desire for new politics and new life by punishing it.
					Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a bylined article.
					
					If the south Koreans are to realize new politics and new life, they should reject the old politics of the "Saenuri Party," reactionary conservative forces, says the article, adding:
					
					To foil the "Saenuri Party's" confrontation with fellow countrymen is the first important step to be taken by the south Koreans to ensure peace and security through new politics.
					
					The past five years brought to light the true colors of the "Saenuri Party" as an anti-reunification political party.
					
					The party has been talkative about "revamp" and "changes" ahead of the "presidential election" but this is no more than rhetoric to make a mockery of the public opinion.
					
					It is indispensable for making progressive development of south Korean society to put an end to the old politics of the "Saenuri Party."
					
					The crimes committed by traitor Lee Myung Bak during his 5-year office are the product of his conspiracy with the party.
					
					The party's desperate bid to stay in power is not prompted by any commitment to bringing "happiness to people" or "achieving economic democracy" but by its last-ditch effort to prolong the remaining days of the old forces forsaken by the era.
					
					The south Korean people should not pin any hope on the party, but reject its traitorous rule in order to achieve social justice and progress and ensure their right to existence.
					
					Whether to open up a new era of improved north-south relations and democracy or to allow the history of dictatorship and anti-reunification repeat itself entirely hinges on the south Korean people.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Marked by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Marked by Foreign Papers
						
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Papers of Bulgaria and Bangladesh carried special write-ups on the occasion of the first anniversary of the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The Bulgarian paper Iskra in its November issue carried articles of various titles under the blockletter title "Eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea". It carried a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					The paper noted:
					
					The idea and line of Kim Jong Il serve as eternal guidelines of the WPK.
					
					He directed his big efforts to developing the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea, as required by the era and the developing revolution.
					
					The situation of the DPRK clearly proves the validity and great vitality of his Songun political line.
					
					He, whom the Korean people hold in high esteem as their eternal leader, is a paragon of genuine patriots.
					
					The Bangladeshi paper Ekota on November 22 carried an article titled "Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism".
					
					The paper said:
					
					Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is an integrated system of idea, theory and method of Juche and comprehensively clarifies the theory of revolution, strategy and tactics of the era of independence on the basis of the Juche idea.
					
					The theory of Songun politics and the theory of building a thriving socialist nation hold an important position in Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as they were founded in reflection of the requirements of developing revolution in the present era.

articles.title: Committees for Remembering Kim Jong Il Inaugurated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Committees for Remembering Kim Jong Il Inaugurated in Different Countries
						
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Committees for remembering leader Kim Jong Il were formed in Brazil, Nigeria and Slovakia on November 23.
					The National Coordinator of a Brazilian party, Ibrahim Mantu, chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association who is member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria, and the director of a Slovak company were elected chairmen of the remembrance committees.
					
					The remembrance committees decided to hold diverse political and cultural events praising the exploits of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities Given Publicity in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Activities Given Publicity in Foreign Countries
						
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's revolutionary activities were reported in different countries between November 19 and 26.
					The news agency of Laos carried a photo of Kim Jong Un among children and reported the news that he looked round the Ryugyong Health Complex, the People's Open-air Ice Rink and the Skate Park nearing completion.
					
					The Nepali newspaper Arpan carried a photo-accompanied news that Marshal Kim Jong Un watched a shooting contest among players of the April 25 National Defence Sports Team and the women's volleyball match between the Pongae Team and the Pyongyang Team.
					
					The Vietnamese internet news agency VN Express carried photo-accompanied news that Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un inspected the training ground of a horse riding company under the Korean People's Army Unit 534 and visited the Ministry of State Security and congratulated security personnel on the anniversary of the security institution.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Highly Praised in Benin and Brazil
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Highly Praised in Benin and Brazil
						
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings took place in Benin and Brazil on November 21 on the occasion of the 1st anniversary of the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The participants in the meetings paid silent tribute to Kim Jong Il.
					
					Speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Beninese National Committee for Remembering General Kim Jong Il, said that Kim Jong Il passed away on a train while continuing his journey for field guidance for the people's happiness.
					
					Pascal Zouncheme, chief of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism and Kimjongilism who is rector of Cotonou Institute of Journalism, noted that the DPRK has a rosy future as the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un is energetically leading the work for accomplishing the cause of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il in the van of building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					Rosanita Campos, vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, said that Kim Jong Il is, indeed, a great man who he  performed tremendous exploits and genius of creation and construction. The Korean revolution pioneered by President Kim Il Sung and developed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il has been successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, the vice-president added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Ecuadorian Library
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Ecuadorian Library
						
Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il Library in Ecuador posted an article titled "Eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea" on its Internet homepage on November 22 on the occasion of the first anniversary of the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The untimely demise of Kim Jong Il in December last year was a great loss to the Korean revolution and world revolution, the article noted, adding:
					
					But HE Kim Jong Il didn't leave us at all and the WPK is holding him in high esteem as its eternal general secretary, vigorously pushing forward the revolution and construction.
					
					He will be always alive in the hearts of humankind for the valuable exploits he performed for the prosperity of the country, happiness of its people and the accomplishment of the cause of global independence.
					
					He mapped out a plan for building a thriving nation despite the sanctions and blockade by the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces, improved the DPRK's status into a politico-ideological power and military power by pursuing his original Songun politics and provided an eternal cornerstone for building an economic power.
					
					The DPRK is demonstrating its might as a full-fledged satellite manufacturer and launcher and a nuclear weapons state. It is all attributable to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					The article expressed firm conviction that the Korean people would surely achieve final victory in their struggle for building a prosperous country and reunifying the country under the Songun leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the WPK and great father.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe a la delegacion de partido chino
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe a la delegacion de partido chino
						
Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recibio este viernes a la delegacion del Partido Comunista de China encabezada por Li Jianguo, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PCCh y vicepresidente del Comite Permanente de la Asamblea Popular Nacional de la Republica Popular China.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Li Jianguo y otros integrantes de la delegacion: el jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh, Wang Jiarui, el subjefe del Departamento de Propaganda del CC del PCCh, Wang Xiaohui, el subjefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh, Liu Jieyi, el viceministro de Superintendencia, Yao Zengke, y el embajador chino en Corea Liu Hongcai.
					
					Tambien, se encontraban Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Yang Gon, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC, y el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Song Nam.
					
					En la ocasion, Li traslado a Kim Jong Un la carta personal de Xi Jinping, Secretario General del CC del PCCh y Presidente de la Comision Militar Central de la misma organizacion.
					
					Expreso agradecimiento a Kim Jong Un por haber recibido a la delegacion a pesar de que esta muy ocupado, y por el encargo del CC del PCCh, le informo como se ha realizado el XVIII Congreso de esa agrupacion politica.
					
					El CC del PCCh con Xi Jinping en la secretaria general esta contento de que el pueblo coreano logre grandes exitos en la lucha por construir un Estado prospero socialista en pleno acato al legado del camarada Kim Jong Il y bajo la guia del camarada Kim Jong Un, expreso.
					
					Continuo que China y Corea son vecinos amistosos con montanas y rios colindantes y el partido y el gobierno chinos tienen la invariable orientacion de consolidar y desarrollar de continuo las tradicionales relaciones de amistad entre dos paises.
					
					Agrego que se esforzara con los camaradas coreanos por consolidar, construir y desarrollar magnificamente las relaciones China-Corea, forjadas y enriquecidas por los lideres de generacion veterana de los dos partidos y dos paises.
					
					Formulo sinceros votos por que Kim Jong Un y el Partido del Trabajo de Corea dirijan al pueblo coreano a lograr sin parar nuevos y mayores exitos en el cumplimiento de la causa de construccion de un Estado prospero.
					
					Luego de expresar agradecimiento al respecto, Kim Jong Un dio bienvenida a la delegacion china y felicito la celebracion exitosa del XVIII congreso del PCCh.
					
					Dijo que ese congreso devino una ocasion historica que hizo balance de las experiencias ideo-teoricas y los exitos logrados por el partido y pueblo chinos en el proceso de construccion del socialismo y preparo nuevo jalon del impulso a la construccion del socialismo con peculiaridades chinas.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que bajo la guia del PCCh encabezado por su Secretario General Xi Jinping, el hermano pueblo chino mantengan la estabilidad social y el desarrollo economico sostenible y mejoren las condiciones de su vida, de modo que sea alcanzada su meta estrategica de construir generalmente una sociedad socialista basicamente acomodada.
					
					El mismo dia, la delegacion china dedico presente a Kim Jong Un quien lo agradecio.

articles.title: Exhibicion nacional de licores y alimentos basicos en Pyongyang
articles.content:
Exhibicion nacional de licores y alimentos basicos en Pyongyang
						
Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar del dia 27 al 30 en el Almacen de la Estacion de Pyongyang la exhibicion nacional de licores y alimentos basicos con la participacion de cientos de unidades de la rama.
					El funcionario del Ministerio de Industria Alimentaria y de Articulos de Uso Diario, Kim Kyong Ho (53 anos de edad) dijo que el proposito de la exhibicion es generalizar los exitos y las experiencias logrados en este sector y resolver los nuevos asuntos cientificos y tecnicos.
					
					La exhibicion se realizo con el metodo de evaluar por los calificadores la calidad, el empaque, la marca y el caracter higienico y cultural de los licores, pasta y salsa de soya y aceite exhibidos por las unidades participantes.
					
					Los productos exhibidos por la Fabrica de Productos Especiales Samilpho, la Fabrica de Alimentos Taedonggang, la Fabrica de Alimentos Basicos de Sinuiju, la Fabrica de Alimentos Sakju y otras atraen a los visitantes.
					
					Los productos de estas unidades evaluados en los ultimos anos por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el Mariscal Kim Jong Un tienen alta fuerza competitiva.
					
					La funcionaria de la Fabrica de Productos Especiales Samilpho, Pang Un Ae (35 anos de edad) senalo que los licores de su fabrica ganan popularidad de los habitantes porque no da olor desagradable ni  dolor a la cabeza.
					
					El licor Hana que obtuvo el primer lugar en la VI evaluacion nacional de licores famosos goza de buena reputacion de los connacionales en el ultramar y los extranjeros.
					
					Durante el tiempo de la exhibicion, hubo el cursillo con el tema de "cultura tradicional de licor coreano y el desarrollo de licor famoso" y "Sobre el estado de la industria de pasta y salsa de soya en el mundo y nuestro pais".

articles.title: Se usa en tratamiento el plano de los puntos de acupuntura en nervio meridiano
articles.content:
Se usa en tratamiento el plano de los puntos de acupuntura en nervio meridiano
						
Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ACNC) -- La Academia de Medicina Coryo usa en el tratamiento el plano de puntos de acupuntura en el nervio meridiano.
					En los ultimos anos, ese metodo rehabilito a los enfermos que padecian enfermedades dificilmente curables, entre otras, la paralisis de nervio facial, el disco dislocado y las enfermedades cerebrovasculares.
					
					Kyongrak, doctrina de anatomia y fisiologia de Corea creada hace mas de 2 milenios,  es el fundamento teorico de la medicina Coryo, en particular, de la acupuntura y moxiterapia de Corea.
					
					A mediados del siglo 20, se ha descubierto que la resistencia electrica de los puntos de acupuntura es mas baja que la de otras partes corporales.
					
					Desde entonces, entraron en etapa crucial los estudios sobre la correlacion entre esa doctrina tradicional y la medicina contemporanea.
					
					Al cabo de varios decenios de estudio, los investigadores presentaron por primera vez a principios de la decada de 1990 la maqueta metalica del plano de puntos de acupuntura en el nervio meridiano.
					
					Los datos de investigacion basica del plano se dieron a la publicidad en los libros de la Sociedad Internacional de Acupuntura y se divulgan en varios paises.

articles.title: Es preciso eliminar las fuerzas conservadoras, insiste Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Es preciso eliminar las fuerzas conservadoras, insiste Rodong Sinmun
						
Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Las "elecciones presidenciales" en el Sur de Corea serviran de un motivo muy importante, que determina la retoma del poder de las fuerzas conservadoras o el triunfo de la aspiracion de las masas populares a sentenciar el "poder" conservador y realizar la nueva politica y la nueva vida.
					Subraya el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo divulgado este viernes y continua:
					
					Para realizar la nueva politica y la nueva vida, los habitantes surcoreanos deben rechazar la vieja politica del "Partido Saenuri", nido de las fuerzas reaccionarias y conservadoras.
					
					Frustrar las maniobras conflictivas del "Partido Saenuri" es el primer paso importante de ellos para disfrutar de la paz y la estabilidad con la nueva politica.
					
					Durante el lustro pasado quedo revelada plenamente la naturaleza del "Partido Saenuri" como entidad politica conflictiva anti-reunificacion.
					
					Esta habla tanto en visperas de las "elecciones presidenciales" de la "renovacion" y el "cambio", pero, esto no pasa de ser un engano para burlar la opinion publica.
					
					Rechazar la vieja politica del "Partido Saenuri" deviene el requisito indispensable para lograr el desarrollo progresista de la sociedad surcoreana.
					
					Durante 5 anos de su mandato, el traidor Lee Myung Bak cometio los crimenes conspirando con el "Partido Saenuri".
					
					Esta entidad se afana en toma del poder no para la "felicidad de la poblacion" y la "democratizacion de la economia" sino para mantener su vida restante de las viejas fuerzas repudiadas por la epoca.
					
					A fin de realizar la justicia y el progreso sociales y asegurar el derecho del pueblo a vivir, no debe depositar su expectativa en el "Partido Saenuri" sino poner fin a su gobernacion traidora.
					
					Abrir la nueva epoca de la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y la democratizacion o repetir la oscura epoca de dictadura y anti-reunificacion, depende enteramente de los mismos habitantes surcoreanos.
